body.name: Night Stand Set 2, Tall Nightstand with Charging Station, Dresser for Bedroom with 4 Drawers, LED End Tables with USB Ports and Outlets, Bedside with Fabric Storage Bins, Brown, HNS034BR
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 31 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: [Nightstand with Variety of RGB Color] Our night stand set 2 with 20-color RGB lights adds a modern touch to your room. The light color, brightness and strobe mode of the LED nightstand can be adjusted at will according to the needs of the scene. The colorful lighting design creates a warm and stylish atmosphere in your bedroom or living room.

[Charge Your Devices with Ease] Our tall night stands for bedroom set of 2 feature USB port, Type C charger and 2 AC outlets on each tabletop, so you can keep your devices fully powered up at all times.

[Plenty of Storage Space] With 4 fabric drawers and an open compartment, the tall nightstands set of 2 offer plenty of space to store your bedside essentials, like cell phones, books, game consoles, record players, and personal items. Keep everything at your fingertips in your bedroom, living room, or office.

[Hold Up to 110LB] Made of environmentally friendly particleboard material with a special waterproof coating which can hold up to 110lb, these side table with charging station are easy to clean and maintain. The classic fabric drawers design provides perfect storage space while reducing the weight of the table for easy movement. Anti-toppling device is provided to prevent it from falling down. Fully guaranteed stability and safety.
[Easy to Assemble] With all the tools and accessories included, you can have this dresser assembled in just 40 minutes! It's slim and lightweight, so it won't take up too much space in your home.

[Perfect Gift for Your Loved] Show your care and love with this LED nightstand with charging station. The soft LED light dispels the darkness in the dark night and creates a dreamy comfortable bedroom atmosphere. It's a perfect gift for your children or anyone who wants to upgrade their bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I love these! They look very nice and were incredibly easy to assemble. I was a little unsure of fabric drawers but these are very well made and they make the whole nightstand light weight and easy to move for cleaning purposes. I have put several items together in the past and have to say this was o e of the best. Every part was included and everything lined up perfectly. Very good value for the price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to follow instructions. I love how tall they are, they fit beside my bed perfectly. The only downfall is if you have both in the same room and try to turn the light on on one of them and off on the other, it doesn’t work. The remote works for both even tho each table has its own remote.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were the perfect size for having one on each side of me and my significant others bed, it’s height is perfect for our bed, even though we have a fairly tall bed, and the 3 drawers and under shelf add tons of extra storage for organization without taking up tons of extra room in our bedroom which is not the smallest, however not the largest of all either! They’ve been very durable aswell so far! For the price, you can’t beat tbem!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size, love the charging station on top, I didn't install the LED lights because that's not my vibe, but I love everything else about them. Easy to assemble, good quality. The only thing I would change is make the drawers just a little bigger, but that's personal preference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Overall Bad Product
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product and used both for nightstands on either side of the bed. First, The assembly was a lot more challenging than you would expect for a tiny nightstand set. It was confusing and misleading and was not an enjoyable experience. The material the nightstands are made of is very cheap and not very sturdy. There is a very small amount of storage space also and you won't be able to fit much in the drawers. However, I think this would be a great product to use for children's rooms with the LED lights and charging station on top. Overall I believe this product is not worth the price and is very cheaply manufactured.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars East to put together. So cute!
reviews.reviewText: East to assemble. Super cute. Drawers are sturdy. Love these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It came damaged. Be careful check the packaging before you open it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Honestly no complaints. Bought this with no reviews so here’s mine. The only real wood is the top of it even is lol. The drawers are like a cheap material that are as good as shelves because they don’t sit on brackets. The led wire inside kinda takes up a lot of room. But like I said no complaints other than maybe a little too costly for what it really is
